stories.text:
Hi everyone I'm doing a UI/UX Case Study on Hacker News and would really appreciate if you answered the questions below. Thank you so much for your time and help! also open to any advice or critique.

1. Which age range do you fall under? - 19 and younger - 20's - 30's - 40's - 50 and older

2. Do you currently or have in the past worked in the tech field? Y/N

3. How long have you been using Hacker News? # of years

4. How often do you visit HN weekly? - multiple times daily - once a day - every other day - once a week

5. Do you contribute to the website? - yes, often - yes, every now and then - no, don't care to - no, too difficult to

6. Rate the usability of the current website. 1 being low 10 being high

7. Why do you choose HN as your Tech news source over other platforms?

8. What do you hope to accomplish when visiting HN? Are you able to accomplish your goal?

9. If you could add a feature and remove a feature from the website what would they be?

10. Describe the current website in one or more words?

Again, thank you for your help!
